name: Spenta
description: Spenta is a Microsoft boutique specialized in cloud computing, SharePoint and related technologies. Founded in 2001, has been awarded twice by Microsoft as World Wide Partner of the Year. With offices in Barcelona, Madrid, Singapore and Sillicon Valley, Spenta is a company with a world known reputation for its excellence in delivering business solutions based on the Microsoft platform, easy to use for end-users, and easy to integrate with other software products and platforms.
